theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Klotho Gene Mutation and Systemic Aging Syndrome Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: This theory focuses on klotho gene mutation causing systemic premature aging phenotypes, highlighting genetic causality and organism-wide effects.
